column4: Hi all. Can somebody tell me which cpu type do I use with AMD Turion 64 x2?
k7 or k8? I compiled 2.6.21 with K8 but system hung at boot :(
k7 stock kernel is fine, but I guess I am not using all the benefits of K8
Use the install for x86. You won't get all the benefits of the 64-bit processor, but it's better for compatibility reasons.
